DURING AN ERUPTION

ğŸ‘‚ğŸ¼ Listen to alerts. The Volcano Notification Service provides up-to-date information about eruptions.
ğŸš” Follow evacuation orders from local authorities. Evacuate early.
ğŸƒ Avoid areas downwind, and river valleys downstream, of the volcano. Rubble and ash will be carried by wind and gravity.
ğŸšª Take temporary shelter from volcanic ash where you are if you have enough supplies. Cover ventilation openings and seal doors and windows.
ğŸ˜· If outside, protect yourself from falling ash that can irritate skin and injure breathing passages, eyes, and open wounds. Use a well-fitting, certified face mask such as an N95.
ğŸš˜ Avoid driving in heavy ash fall.
